Package ch.unibas.bsc.detapp.utilities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EditTextValidator
    A validator class for EditText input fields.
    LineChartUtils
    Use this class to create LineCharts, modify and apply styling to LineCharts.
    LineChartWrapper
    Wrapper class for managing LineCharts.
    PatientManager  
    PixelsToDpConverter  
    RecordingHandler
    Since handling recordings is not a trivial task, here are some functions that are helping with creating and updating recording entries in the db.
    RecordingManager  
    SensorDataConverter
    Use the methods in this class to convert a list of SensorDataEntity.
    SensorLiveData
    To share the this life-cycle object between multiple fragments, LiveData is implemented as singleton.
    SensorLiveDataConnector  
    SensorManager  
    TherapyHandler  
    TimeConverter
